title: FLUX.2 Image Generation - All Workflows
description: Production-ready serverless endpoint for FLUX.2 image generation with text-to-image, image-to-image, and multi-reference workflows. Supports both FLUX.2-dev (high quality, 50 steps) and FLUX.2-schnell (fast, 4 steps). Features 4-bit quantization for memory optimization, seed control for reproducibility, and customizable generation parameters.

config.gpuIds: NVIDIA A40,NVIDIA A100-PCIE-40GB,NVIDIA A100-SXM4-80GB,NVIDIA RTX A6000

env.name: HF_TOKEN
env.description: HuggingFace API token (required for FLUX.2-dev, optional for schnell)

presets.name: FLUX.2-dev (High Quality)
presets.description: Best quality, slower (28-50 steps, requires HF token)

presets.name: FLUX.2-schnell (Fast)
presets.description: Fast generation (1-4 steps, no HF token needed)
